column1: Smoque BBQ////Amazing!  I have always been skeptical of BBQ in chicago
column2: but now Smoque has changed all that.  I stood in line for about 45 minutes on a Saturday night
column3: but it was well worth the wait.  I had the 1/2 and 1/2 sandwich (1/2 brisket
column7: and peach cobbler were all equally amazing.   My only complaint is that this place should either be bigger or they should open another location.  Yum!
